name: Kale Collins
description: A green take on a traditional gin collins, made with muddled lovage, cucumber slices, and lemon juice.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce fresh lemon juice from 1 lemon
Garnish: Lovage leaf and thin cucumber slice

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle lovage leaves with the cucumber slices in a Collins glass or small mason jar.
Add simple syrup, gin, lemon juice, and kale juice. Stir to combine. Fill glass with ice, top with seltzer and stir gently to mix. Garnish cocktail with lovage and thin cucumber slice.
